text: In 2015, NBC News reported on a GOP chart that was "about to be released" showing what looked like an enormous increase in welfare claimsbetween 2009 and 2011. They titled the chart "Jaw Dropping:…"image.pngIn 2015 the US Population was 312million. In 2009 it was about 307million.2009: 97/307 = 31.596%2015: 97/312 = 31.089%Δ = - 0.5%Adjusted for population growth, it looks like the number of people receiving welfare during the period of 2009-2011 actually went down by 0.5%.To make matters worse, the GOP used a y axis that skewed the delta to look larger than it was. Taken together this chart is deceptive to the point offraudulent.
